text_entry: This forenamed maid hath yet in her the continuance

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: of her first affection: his unjust unkindness, that

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: in all reason should have quenched her love, hath,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: like an impediment in the current, made it more

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: violent and unruly. Go you to Angelo; answer his

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: requiring with a plausible obedience; agree with

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: his demands to the point; only refer yourself to

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: this advantage, first, that your stay with him may

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: not be long; that the time may have all shadow and

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: silence in it; and the place answer to convenience.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: This being granted in course,--and now follows

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: all,--we shall advise this wronged maid to stead up

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: your appointment, go in your place; if the encounter

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: acknowledge itself hereafter, it may compel him to

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: her recompense: and here, by this, is your brother

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: saved, your honour untainted, the poor Mariana

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: advantaged, and the corrupt deputy scaled. The maid

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: will I frame and make fit for his attempt. If you

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: think well to carry this as you may, the doubleness

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: of the benefit defends the deceit from reproof.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: What think you of it?

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: The image of it gives me content already; and I

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: trust it will grow to a most prosperous perfection.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: It lies much in your holding up. Haste you speedily

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: to Angelo: if for this night he entreat you to his

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: bed, give him promise of satisfaction. I will

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: presently to Saint Luke's: there, at the moated

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: grange, resides this dejected Mariana. At that

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: place call upon me; and dispatch with Angelo, that

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: it may be quickly.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: I thank you for this comfort. Fare you well, good father.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Exeunt severally

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: SCENE II. The street before the prison.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Enter, on one side, DUKE VINCENTIO disguised as before; on the other, ELBOW, and Officers with POMPEY

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: Nay, if there be no remedy for it, but that you will

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: needs buy and sell men and women like beasts, we

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: shall have all the world drink brown and white bastard.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: O heavens! what stuff is here

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: 'Twas never merry world since, of two usuries, the

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: merriest was put down, and the worser allowed by

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: order of law a furred gown to keep him warm; and

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: furred with fox and lamb-skins too, to signify, that

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: craft, being richer than innocency, stands for the facing.

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: Come your way, sir. 'Bless you, good father friar.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And you, good brother father. What offence hath

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: this man made you, sir?

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: Marry, sir, he hath offended the law: and, sir, we

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: take him to be a thief too, sir; for we have found

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: upon him, sir, a strange picklock, which we have

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: sent to the deputy.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Fie, sirrah! a bawd, a wicked bawd!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The evil that thou causest to be done,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That is thy means to live. Do thou but think

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: What 'tis to cram a maw or clothe a back

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: From such a filthy vice: say to thyself,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: From their abominable and beastly touches

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I drink, I eat, array myself, and live.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Canst thou believe thy living is a life,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: So stinkingly depending? Go mend, go mend.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Indeed, it does stink in some sort, sir; but yet,

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: sir, I would prove--

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Nay, if the devil have given thee proofs for sin,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Thou wilt prove his. Take him to prison, officer:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Correction and instruction must both work

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Ere this rude beast will profit.

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: He must before the deputy, sir; he has given him

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: warning: the deputy cannot abide a whoremaster: if

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: he be a whoremonger, and comes before him, he were

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: as good go a mile on his errand.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That we were all, as some would seem to be,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: From our faults, as faults from seeming, free!

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: His neck will come to your waist,--a cord, sir.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: I spy comfort; I cry bail. Here's a gentleman and a

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: friend of mine.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Enter LUCIO

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: How now, noble Pompey! What, at the wheels of

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Caesar? art thou led in triumph? What, is there

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: none of Pygmalion's images, newly made woman, to be

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: had now, for putting the hand in the pocket and

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: extracting it clutch'd? What reply, ha? What

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: sayest thou to this tune, matter and method? Is't

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: not drowned i' the last rain, ha? What sayest

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: thou, Trot? Is the world as it was, man? Which is

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: the way? Is it sad, and few words? or how? The

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: trick of it?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Still thus, and thus; still worse!

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: How doth my dear morsel, thy mistress? Procures she

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: still, ha?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Troth, sir, she hath eaten up all her beef, and she

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: is herself in the tub.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Why, 'tis good; it is the right of it; it must be

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: so: ever your fresh whore and your powdered bawd:

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: an unshunned consequence; it must be so. Art going

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: to prison, Pompey?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Yes, faith, sir.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Why, 'tis not amiss, Pompey. Farewell: go, say I

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: sent thee thither. For debt, Pompey? or how?

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: For being a bawd, for being a bawd.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Well, then, imprison him: if imprisonment be the

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: due of a bawd, why, 'tis his right: bawd is he

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: doubtless, and of antiquity too; bawd-born.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Farewell, good Pompey. Commend me to the prison,

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Pompey: you will turn good husband now, Pompey; you

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: will keep the house.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: I hope, sir, your good worship will be my bail.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: No, indeed, will I not, Pompey; it is not the wear.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: I will pray, Pompey, to increase your bondage: If

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: you take it not patiently, why, your mettle is the

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: more. Adieu, trusty Pompey. 'Bless you, friar.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And you.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Does Bridget paint still, Pompey, ha?

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: Come your ways, sir; come.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: You will not bail me, then, sir?

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Then, Pompey, nor now. What news abroad, friar?

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: what news?

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: Come your ways, sir; come.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Go to kennel, Pompey; go.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Exeunt ELBOW, POMPEY and Officers

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: What news, friar, of the duke?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I know none. Can you tell me of any?

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Some say he is with the Emperor of Russia; other

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: some, he is in Rome: but where is he, think you?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I know not where; but wheresoever, I wish him well.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: It was a mad fantastical trick of him to steal from

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: the state, and usurp the beggary he was never born

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: to. Lord Angelo dukes it well in his absence; he

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: puts transgression to 't.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: He does well in 't.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: A little more lenity to lechery would do no harm in

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: him: something too crabbed that way, friar.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: It is too general a vice, and severity must cure it.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Yes, in good sooth, the vice is of a great kindred;

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: it is well allied: but it is impossible to extirp

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: it quite, friar, till eating and drinking be put

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: down. They say this Angelo was not made by man and

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: woman after this downright way of creation: is it

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: true, think you?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: How should he be made, then?

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Some report a sea-maid spawned him; some, that he

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: was begot between two stock-fishes. But it is

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: certain that when he makes water his urine is

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: congealed ice; that I know to be true: and he is a

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: motion generative; that's infallible.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: You are pleasant, sir, and speak apace.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Why, what a ruthless thing is this in him, for the

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: rebellion of a codpiece to take away the life of a

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: man! Would the duke that is absent have done this?

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Ere he would have hanged a man for the getting a

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: hundred bastards, he would have paid for the nursing

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: a thousand: he had some feeling of the sport: he

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: knew the service, and that instructed him to mercy.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I never heard the absent duke much detected for

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: women; he was not inclined that way.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: O, sir, you are deceived.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: 'Tis not possible.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Who, not the duke? yes, your beggar of fifty; and

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: his use was to put a ducat in her clack-dish: the

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: duke had crotchets in him. He would be drunk too;

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: that let me inform you.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: You do him wrong, surely.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Sir, I was an inward of his. A shy fellow was the

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: duke: and I believe I know the cause of his

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: withdrawing.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: What, I prithee, might be the cause?

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: No, pardon; 'tis a secret must be locked within the

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: teeth and the lips: but this I can let you

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: understand, the greater file of the subject held the

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: duke to be wise.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Wise! why, no question but he was.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: A very superficial, ignorant, unweighing fellow.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Either this is the envy in you, folly, or mistaking:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: the very stream of his life and the business he hath

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: helmed must upon a warranted need give him a better

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: proclamation. Let him be but testimonied in his own

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: bringings-forth, and he shall appear to the

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: envious a scholar, a statesman and a soldier.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Therefore you speak unskilfully: or if your

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: knowledge be more it is much darkened in your malice.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Sir, I know him, and I love him.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Love talks with better knowledge, and knowledge with

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: dearer love.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Come, sir, I know what I know.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I can hardly believe that, since you know not what

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: you speak. But, if ever the duke return, as our

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: prayers are he may, let me desire you to make your

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: answer before him. If it be honest you have spoke,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: you have courage to maintain it: I am bound to call

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: upon you; and, I pray you, your name?

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Sir, my name is Lucio; well known to the duke.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: He shall know you better, sir, if I may live to

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: report you.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: I fear you not.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: O, you hope the duke will return no more; or you

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: imagine me too unhurtful an opposite. But indeed I

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: can do you little harm; you'll forswear this again.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: I'll be hanged first: thou art deceived in me,

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: friar. But no more of this. Canst thou tell if

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Claudio die to-morrow or no?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Why should he die, sir?

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Why? For filling a bottle with a tundish. I would

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: the duke we talk of were returned again: the

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: ungenitured agent will unpeople the province with

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: continency; sparrows must not build in his

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: house-eaves, because they are lecherous. The duke

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: yet would have dark deeds darkly answered; he would

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: never bring them to light: would he were returned!

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Marry, this Claudio is condemned for untrussing.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Farewell, good friar: I prithee, pray for me. The

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: duke, I say to thee again, would eat mutton on

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Fridays. He's not past it yet, and I say to thee,

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: he would mouth with a beggar, though she smelt brown

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: bread and garlic: say that I said so. Farewell.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Exit

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: No might nor greatness in mortality

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Can censure 'scape; back-wounding calumny

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The whitest virtue strikes. What king so strong

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Can tie the gall up in the slanderous tongue?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: But who comes here?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Enter ESCALUS, Provost, and Officers with MISTRESS OVERDONE

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Go; away with her to prison!

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: Good my lord, be good to me; your honour is accounted

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: a merciful man; good my lord.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Double and treble admonition, and still forfeit in

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: the same kind! This would make mercy swear and play

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: the tyrant.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: A bawd of eleven years' continuance, may it please

speaker: Provost
text_entry: your honour.

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: My lord, this is one Lucio's information against me.

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: Mistress Kate Keepdown was with child by him in the

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: duke's time; he promised her marriage: his child

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: is a year and a quarter old, come Philip and Jacob:

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: I have kept it myself; and see how he goes about to abuse me!

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: That fellow is a fellow of much licence: let him be

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: called before us. Away with her to prison! Go to;

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: no more words.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Exeunt Officers with MISTRESS OVERDONE

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Provost, my brother Angelo will not be altered;

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Claudio must die to-morrow: let him be furnished

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: with divines, and have all charitable preparation.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: if my brother wrought by my pity, it should not be

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: so with him.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: So please you, this friar hath been with him, and

speaker: Provost
text_entry: advised him for the entertainment of death.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Good even, good father.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Bliss and goodness on you!

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Of whence are you?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Not of this country, though my chance is now

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To use it for my time: I am a brother

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Of gracious order, late come from the See

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: In special business from his holiness.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: What news abroad i' the world?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: None, but that there is so great a fever on

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: goodness, that the dissolution of it must cure it:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: novelty is only in request; and it is as dangerous

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: to be aged in any kind of course, as it is virtuous

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: to be constant in any undertaking. There is scarce

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: truth enough alive to make societies secure; but

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: security enough to make fellowships accurst: much

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: upon this riddle runs the wisdom of the world. This

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: news is old enough, yet it is every day's news. I

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: pray you, sir, of what disposition was the duke?

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: One that, above all other strifes, contended

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: especially to know himself.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: What pleasure was he given to?

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Rather rejoicing to see another merry, than merry at

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: any thing which professed to make him rejoice: a

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: gentleman of all temperance. But leave we him to

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: his events, with a prayer they may prove prosperous;

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: and let me desire to know how you find Claudio

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: prepared. I am made to understand that you have

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: lent him visitation.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: He professes to have received no sinister measure

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: from his judge, but most willingly humbles himself

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: to the determination of justice: yet had he framed

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: to himself, by the instruction of his frailty, many

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: deceiving promises of life; which I by my good

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: leisure have discredited to him, and now is he

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: resolved to die.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: You have paid the heavens your function, and the

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: prisoner the very debt of your calling. I have

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: laboured for the poor gentleman to the extremest

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: shore of my modesty: but my brother justice have I

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: found so severe, that he hath forced me to tell him

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: he is indeed Justice.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: If his own life answer the straitness of his

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: proceeding, it shall become him well; wherein if he

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: chance to fail, he hath sentenced himself.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: I am going to visit the prisoner. Fare you well.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Peace be with you!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Exeunt ESCALUS and Provost

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: He who the sword of heaven will bear

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Should be as holy as severe;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Pattern in himself to know,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Grace to stand, and virtue go;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: More nor less to others paying

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Than by self-offences weighing.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Shame to him whose cruel striking

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Kills for faults of his own liking!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Twice treble shame on Angelo,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To weed my vice and let his grow!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: O, what may man within him hide,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Though angel on the outward side!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: How may likeness made in crimes,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Making practise on the times,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To draw with idle spiders' strings

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Most ponderous and substantial things!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Craft against vice I must apply:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: With Angelo to-night shall lie

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: His old betrothed but despised;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: So disguise shall, by the disguised,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Pay with falsehood false exacting,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And perform an old contracting.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Exit

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: ACT IV

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: SCENE I. The moated grange at ST. LUKE's.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Enter MARIANA and a Boy

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Boy sings

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Take, O, take those lips away,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That so sweetly were forsworn;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And those eyes, the break of day,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Lights that do mislead the morn:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: But my kisses bring again, bring again;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Seals of love, but sealed in vain, sealed in vain.

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: Break off thy song, and haste thee quick away:

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: Here comes a man of comfort, whose advice

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: Hath often still'd my brawling discontent.

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: Exit Boy

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: Enter DUKE VINCENTIO disguised as before

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: I cry you mercy, sir; and well could wish

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: You had not found me here so musical:

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: Let me excuse me, and believe me so,

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: My mirth it much displeased, but pleased my woe.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: 'Tis good; though music oft hath such a charm

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To make bad good, and good provoke to harm.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I pray, you, tell me, hath any body inquired

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: for me here to-day? much upon this time have

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I promised here to meet.

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: You have not been inquired after:

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: I have sat here all day.

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: Enter ISABELLA

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I do constantly believe you. The time is come even

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: now. I shall crave your forbearance a little: may

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: be I will call upon you anon, for some advantage to yourself.

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: I am always bound to you.

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: Exit

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Very well met, and well come.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: What is the news from this good deputy?

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: He hath a garden circummured with brick,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Whose western side is with a vineyard back'd;

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: And to that vineyard is a planched gate,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: That makes his opening with this bigger key:

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: This other doth command a little door

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Which from the vineyard to the garden leads;

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: There have I made my promise

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Upon the heavy middle of the night

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: To call upon him.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: But shall you on your knowledge find this way?

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: I have ta'en a due and wary note upon't:

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: With whispering and most guilty diligence,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: In action all of precept, he did show me

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: The way twice o'er.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Are there no other tokens

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Between you 'greed concerning her observance?

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: No, none, but only a repair i' the dark;

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: And that I have possess'd him my most stay

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Can be but brief; for I have made him know

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: I have a servant comes with me along,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: That stays upon me, whose persuasion is

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: I come about my brother.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: 'Tis well borne up.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I have not yet made known to Mariana

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: A word of this. What, ho! within! come forth!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Re-enter MARIANA

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I pray you, be acquainted with this maid;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: She comes to do you good.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: I do desire the like.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Do you persuade yourself that I respect you?

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: Good friar, I know you do, and have found it.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Take, then, this your companion by the hand,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Who hath a story ready for your ear.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I shall attend your leisure: but make haste;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The vaporous night approaches.

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: Will't please you walk aside?

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: Exeunt MARIANA and ISABELLA

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: O place and greatness! millions of false eyes

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Are stuck upon thee: volumes of report

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Run with these false and most contrarious quests

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Upon thy doings: thousand escapes of wit

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Make thee the father of their idle dreams

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And rack thee in their fancies.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Re-enter MARIANA and ISABELLA

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Welcome, how agreed?

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: She'll take the enterprise upon her, father,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: If you advise it.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: It is not my consent,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: But my entreaty too.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Little have you to say

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: When you depart from him, but, soft and low,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: 'Remember now my brother.'

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: Fear me not.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Nor, gentle daughter, fear you not at all.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: He is your husband on a pre-contract:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To bring you thus together, 'tis no sin,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Sith that the justice of your title to him

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Doth flourish the deceit. Come, let us go:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Our corn's to reap, for yet our tithe's to sow.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Exeunt

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: SCENE II. A room in the prison.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Enter Provost and POMPEY

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Come hither, sirrah. Can you cut off a man's head?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: If the man be a bachelor, sir, I can; but if he be a

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: married man, he's his wife's head, and I can never

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: cut off a woman's head.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Come, sir, leave me your snatches, and yield me a

speaker: Provost
text_entry: direct answer. To-morrow morning are to die Claudio

speaker: Provost
text_entry: and Barnardine. Here is in our prison a common

speaker: Provost
text_entry: executioner, who in his office lacks a helper: if

speaker: Provost
text_entry: you will take it on you to assist him, it shall

speaker: Provost
text_entry: redeem you from your gyves; if not, you shall have

speaker: Provost
text_entry: your full time of imprisonment and your deliverance

speaker: Provost
text_entry: with an unpitied whipping, for you have been a

speaker: Provost
text_entry: notorious bawd.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Sir, I have been an unlawful bawd time out of mind;

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: but yet I will be content to be a lawful hangman. I

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: would be glad to receive some instruction from my

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: fellow partner.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: What, ho! Abhorson! Where's Abhorson, there?

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Enter ABHORSON

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Do you call, sir?

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Sirrah, here's a fellow will help you to-morrow in

speaker: Provost
text_entry: your execution. If you think it meet, compound with

speaker: Provost
text_entry: him by the year, and let him abide here with you; if

speaker: Provost
text_entry: not, use him for the present and dismiss him. He

speaker: Provost
text_entry: cannot plead his estimation with you; he hath been a bawd.

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: A bawd, sir? fie upon him! he will discredit our mystery.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Go to, sir; you weigh equally; a feather will turn

speaker: Provost
text_entry: the scale.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Exit

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Pray, sir, by your good favour,--for surely, sir, a

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: good favour you have, but that you have a hanging

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: look,--do you call, sir, your occupation a mystery?

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Ay, sir; a mystery

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Painting, sir, I have heard say, is a mystery; and

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: your whores, sir, being members of my occupation,

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: using painting, do prove my occupation a mystery:

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: but what mystery there should be in hanging, if I

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: should be hanged, I cannot imagine.

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Sir, it is a mystery.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Proof?

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Every true man's apparel fits your thief: if it be

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: too little for your thief, your true man thinks it

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: big enough; if it be too big for your thief, your

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: thief thinks it little enough: so every true man's

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: apparel fits your thief.

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Re-enter Provost

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Are you agreed?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Sir, I will serve him; for I do find your hangman is

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: a more penitent trade than your bawd; he doth

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: oftener ask forgiveness.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: You, sirrah, provide your block and your axe

speaker: Provost
text_entry: to-morrow four o'clock.

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Come on, bawd; I will instruct thee in my trade; follow.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: I do desire to learn, sir: and I hope, if you have

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: occasion to use me for your own turn, you shall find

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: me yare; for truly, sir, for your kindness I owe you

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: a good turn.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Call hither Barnardine and Claudio:

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Exeunt POMPEY and ABHORSON

speaker: Provost
text_entry: The one has my pity; not a jot the other,

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Being a murderer, though he were my brother.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Enter CLAUDIO

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Look, here's the warrant, Claudio, for thy death:

speaker: Provost
text_entry: 'Tis now dead midnight, and by eight to-morrow

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Thou must be made immortal. Where's Barnardine?

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: As fast lock'd up in sleep as guiltless labour

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: When it lies starkly in the traveller's bones:

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: He will not wake.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Who can do good on him?

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Well, go, prepare yourself.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Knocking within

speaker: Provost
text_entry: But, hark, what noise?

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Heaven give your spirits comfort!

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Exit CLAUDIO

speaker: Provost
text_entry: By and by.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: I hope it is some pardon or reprieve

speaker: Provost
text_entry: For the most gentle Claudio.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Enter DUKE VINCENTIO disguised as before

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Welcome father.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The best and wholesomest spirts of the night

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Envelope you, good Provost! Who call'd here of late?

speaker: Provost
text_entry: None, since the curfew rung.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Not Isabel?

speaker: Provost
text_entry: No.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: They will, then, ere't be long.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: What comfort is for Claudio?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: There's some in hope.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: It is a bitter deputy.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Not so, not so; his life is parallel'd

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Even with the stroke and line of his great justice:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: He doth with holy abstinence subdue

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That in himself which he spurs on his power

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To qualify in others: were he meal'd with that

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Which he corrects, then were he tyrannous;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: But this being so, he's just.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Knocking within

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Now are they come.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Exit Provost

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: This is a gentle provost: seldom when

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The steeled gaoler is the friend of men.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Knocking within

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: How now! what noise? That spirit's possessed with haste

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That wounds the unsisting postern with these strokes.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Re-enter Provost

speaker: Provost
text_entry: There he must stay until the officer

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Arise to let him in: he is call'd up.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Have you no countermand for Claudio yet,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: But he must die to-morrow?

speaker: Provost
text_entry: None, sir, none.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: As near the dawning, provost, as it is,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: You shall hear more ere morning.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Happily

speaker: Provost
text_entry: You something know; yet I believe there comes

speaker: Provost
text_entry: No countermand; no such example have we:

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Besides, upon the very siege of justice

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Lord Angelo hath to the public ear

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Profess'd the contrary.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Enter a Messenger

speaker: Provost
text_entry: This is his lordship's man.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And here comes Claudio's pardon.

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: [Giving a paper]

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: My lord hath sent you this note; and by me this

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: further charge, that you swerve not from the

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: smallest article of it, neither in time, matter, or

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: other circumstance. Good morrow; for, as I take it,

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: it is almost day.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: I shall obey him.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Exit Messenger

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: [Aside]  This is his pardon, purchased by such sin

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: For which the pardoner himself is in.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Hence hath offence his quick celerity,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: When it is born in high authority:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: When vice makes mercy, mercy's so extended,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That for the fault's love is the offender friended.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Now, sir, what news?

speaker: Provost
text_entry: I told you. Lord Angelo, belike thinking me remiss

speaker: Provost
text_entry: in mine office, awakens me with this unwonted

speaker: Provost
text_entry: putting-on; methinks strangely, for he hath not used it before.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Pray you, let's hear.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: [Reads]

speaker: Provost
text_entry: 'Whatsoever you may hear to the contrary, let

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Claudio be executed by four of the clock; and in the

speaker: Provost
text_entry: afternoon Barnardine: for my better satisfaction,

speaker: Provost
text_entry: let me have Claudio's head sent me by five. Let

speaker: Provost
text_entry: this be duly performed; with a thought that more

speaker: Provost
text_entry: depends on it than we must yet deliver. Thus fail

speaker: Provost
text_entry: not to do your office, as you will answer it at your peril.'

speaker: Provost
text_entry: What say you to this, sir?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: What is that Barnardine who is to be executed in the

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: afternoon?

speaker: Provost
text_entry: A Bohemian born, but here nursed un and bred; one

speaker: Provost
text_entry: that is a prisoner nine years old.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: How came it that the absent duke had not either

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: delivered him to his liberty or executed him? I

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: have heard it was ever his manner to do so.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: His friends still wrought reprieves for him: and,

speaker: Provost
text_entry: indeed, his fact, till now in the government of Lord

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Angelo, came not to an undoubtful proof.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: It is now apparent?

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Most manifest, and not denied by himself.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Hath he born himself penitently in prison? how

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: seems he to be touched?

speaker: Provost
text_entry: A man that apprehends death no more dreadfully but

speaker: Provost
text_entry: as a drunken sleep; careless, reckless, and fearless

speaker: Provost
text_entry: of what's past, present, or to come; insensible of

speaker: Provost
text_entry: mortality, and desperately mortal.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: He wants advice.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: He will hear none: he hath evermore had the liberty

speaker: Provost
text_entry: of the prison; give him leave to escape hence, he

speaker: Provost
text_entry: would not: drunk many times a day, if not many days

speaker: Provost
text_entry: entirely drunk. We have very oft awaked him, as if

speaker: Provost
text_entry: to carry him to execution, and showed him a seeming

speaker: Provost
text_entry: warrant for it: it hath not moved him at all.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: More of him anon. There is written in your brow,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: provost, honesty and constancy: if I read it not

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: truly, my ancient skill beguiles me; but, in the

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: boldness of my cunning, I will lay myself in hazard.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Claudio, whom here you have warrant to execute, is

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: no greater forfeit to the law than Angelo who hath

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: sentenced him. To make you understand this in a

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: manifested effect, I crave but four days' respite;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: for the which you are to do me both a present and a

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: dangerous courtesy.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Pray, sir, in what?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: In the delaying death.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: A lack, how may I do it, having the hour limited,

speaker: Provost
text_entry: and an express command, under penalty, to deliver

speaker: Provost
text_entry: his head in the view of Angelo? I may make my case

speaker: Provost
text_entry: as Claudio's, to cross this in the smallest.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: By the vow of mine order I warrant you, if my

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: instructions may be your guide. Let this Barnardine

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: be this morning executed, and his head born to Angelo.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Angelo hath seen them both, and will discover the favour.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: O, death's a great disguiser; and you may add to it.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Shave the head, and tie the beard; and say it was

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: the desire of the penitent to be so bared before his

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: death: you know the course is common. If any thing

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: fall to you upon this, more than thanks and good

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: fortune, by the saint whom I profess, I will plead

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: against it with my life.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Pardon me, good father; it is against my oath.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Were you sworn to the duke, or to the deputy?

speaker: Provost
text_entry: To him, and to his substitutes.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: You will think you have made no offence, if the duke

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: avouch the justice of your dealing?

speaker: Provost
text_entry: But what likelihood is in that?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Not a resemblance, but a certainty. Yet since I see

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: you fearful, that neither my coat, integrity, nor

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: persuasion can with ease attempt you, I will go

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: further than I meant, to pluck all fears out of you.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Look you, sir, here is the hand and seal of the

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: duke: you know the character, I doubt not; and the

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: signet is not strange to you.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: I know them both.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The contents of this is the return of the duke: you

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: shall anon over-read it at your pleasure; where you

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: shall find, within these two days he will be here.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: This is a thing that Angelo knows not; for he this

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: very day receives letters of strange tenor;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: perchance of the duke's death; perchance entering

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: into some monastery; but, by chance, nothing of what

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: is writ. Look, the unfolding star calls up the

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: shepherd. Put not yourself into amazement how these

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: things should be: all difficulties are but easy

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: when they are known. Call your executioner, and off

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: with Barnardine's head: I will give him a present

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: shrift and advise him for a better place. Yet you

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: are amazed; but this shall absolutely resolve you.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Come away; it is almost clear dawn.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Exeunt

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: SCENE III. Another room in the same.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Enter POMPEY

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: I am as well acquainted here as I was in our house

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: of profession: one would think it were Mistress

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Overdone's own house, for here be many of her old

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: customers. First, here's young Master Rash; he's in

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: for a commodity of brown paper and old ginger,

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: ninescore and seventeen pounds; of which he made

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: five marks, ready money: marry, then ginger was not

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: much in request, for the old women were all dead.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Then is there here one Master Caper, at the suit of

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Master Three-pile the mercer, for some four suits of

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: peach-coloured satin, which now peaches him a

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: beggar. Then have we here young Dizy, and young

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Master Deep-vow, and Master Copperspur, and Master

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Starve-lackey the rapier and dagger man, and young

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Drop-heir that killed lusty Pudding, and Master

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Forthlight the tilter, and brave Master Shooty the

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: great traveller, and wild Half-can that stabbed

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Pots, and, I think, forty more; all great doers in

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: our trade, and are now 'for the Lord's sake.'

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Enter ABHORSON

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Sirrah, bring Barnardine hither.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Master Barnardine! you must rise and be hanged.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Master Barnardine!

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: What, ho, Barnardine!

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: [Within]  A pox o' your throats! Who makes that

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: noise there? What are you?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Your friends, sir; the hangman. You must be so

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: good, sir, to rise and be put to death.

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: [Within]  Away, you rogue, away! I am sleepy.

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Tell him he must awake, and that quickly too.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Pray, Master Barnardine, awake till you are

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: executed, and sleep afterwards.

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Go in to him, and fetch him out.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: He is coming, sir, he is coming; I hear his straw rustle.

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Is the axe upon the block, sirrah?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Very ready, sir.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Enter BARNARDINE

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: How now, Abhorson? what's the news with you?

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Truly, sir, I would desire you to clap into your

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: prayers; for, look you, the warrant's come.

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: You rogue, I have been drinking all night; I am not

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: fitted for 't.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: O, the better, sir; for he that drinks all night,

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: and is hanged betimes in the morning, may sleep the

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: sounder all the next day.

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Look you, sir; here comes your ghostly father: do

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: we jest now, think you?

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Enter DUKE VINCENTIO disguised as before

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Sir, induced by my charity, and hearing how hastily

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: you are to depart, I am come to advise you, comfort

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: you and pray with you.

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: Friar, not I I have been drinking hard all night,

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: and I will have more time to prepare me, or they

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: shall beat out my brains with billets: I will not

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: consent to die this day, that's certain.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: O, sir, you must: and therefore I beseech you

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Look forward on the journey you shall go.

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: I swear I will not die to-day for any man's

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: persuasion.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: But hear you.

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: Not a word: if you have any thing to say to me,

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: come to my ward; for thence will not I to-day.

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: Exit

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Unfit to live or die: O gravel heart!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: After him, fellows; bring him to the block.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Exeunt ABHORSON and POMPEY

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Re-enter Provost

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Now, sir, how do you find the prisoner?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: A creature unprepared, unmeet for death;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And to transport him in the mind he is

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Were damnable.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Here in the prison, father,

speaker: Provost
text_entry: There died this morning of a cruel fever

speaker: Provost
text_entry: One Ragozine, a most notorious pirate,

speaker: Provost
text_entry: A man of Claudio's years; his beard and head

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Just of his colour. What if we do omit

speaker: Provost
text_entry: This reprobate till he were well inclined;

speaker: Provost
text_entry: And satisfy the deputy with the visage

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Of Ragozine, more like to Claudio?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: O, 'tis an accident that heaven provides!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Dispatch it presently; the hour draws on

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Prefix'd by Angelo: see this be done,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And sent according to command; whiles I

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Persuade this rude wretch willingly to die.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: This shall be done, good father, presently.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: But Barnardine must die this afternoon:

speaker: Provost
text_entry: And how shall we continue Claudio,

speaker: Provost
text_entry: To save me from the danger that might come

speaker: Provost
text_entry: If he were known alive?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Let this be done.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Put them in secret holds, both Barnardine and Claudio:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Ere twice the sun hath made his journal greeting

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To the under generation, you shall find

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Your safety manifested.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: I am your free dependant.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Quick, dispatch, and send the head to Angelo.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Exit Provost

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Now will I write letters to Angelo,--

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The provost, he shall bear them, whose contents

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Shall witness to him I am near at home,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And that, by great injunctions, I am bound

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To enter publicly: him I'll desire

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To meet me at the consecrated fount

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: A league below the city; and from thence,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: By cold gradation and well-balanced form,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: We shall proceed with Angelo.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Re-enter Provost

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Here is the head; I'll carry it myself.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Convenient is it. Make a swift return;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: For I would commune with you of such things

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That want no ear but yours.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: I'll make all speed.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Exit

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: [Within]  Peace, ho, be here!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The tongue of Isabel. She's come to know

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: If yet her brother's pardon be come hither:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: But I will keep her ignorant of her good,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To make her heavenly comforts of despair,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: When it is least expected.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Enter ISABELLA

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Ho, by your leave!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Good morning to you, fair and gracious daughter.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: The better, given me by so holy a man.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Hath yet the deputy sent my brother's pardon?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: He hath released him, Isabel, from the world:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: His head is off and sent to Angelo.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Nay, but it is not so.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: It is no other: show your wisdom, daughter,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: In your close patience.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: O, I will to him and pluck out his eyes!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: You shall not be admitted to his sight.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Unhappy Claudio! wretched Isabel!

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Injurious world! most damned Angelo!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: This nor hurts him nor profits you a jot;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Forbear it therefore; give your cause to heaven.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Mark what I say, which you shall find

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: One of our convent, and his confessor,

text_entry: Notice to Escalus and Angelo,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Who do prepare to meet him at the gates,

text_entry: In that good path that I would wish it go,

text_entry: And you shall have your bosom on this wretch,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: This letter, then, to Friar Peter give;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: 'Tis that he sent me of the duke's return:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Say, by this token, I desire his company

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: At Mariana's house to-night. Her cause and yours

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And shall be absent. Wend you with this letter:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Command these fretting waters from your eyes

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: With a light heart; trust not my holy order,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: If I pervert your course. Who's here?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Enter LUCIO

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Good even. Friar, where's the provost?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO

speaker: LUCIO

speaker: LUCIO

speaker: LUCIO

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: my head fill my belly; one fruitful meal would set

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: me to 't. But they say the duke will be here

speaker: LUCIO

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: if the old fantastical duke of dark corners had been

speaker: LUCIO

speaker: LUCIO

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Sir, the duke is marvellous little beholding to your

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: reports; but the best is, he lives not in them.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Friar, thou knowest not the duke so well as I do:

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: he's a better woodman than thou takest him for.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Well, you'll answer this one day. Fare ye well.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Nay, tarry; I'll go along with thee

text_entry: I can tell thee pretty tales of the duke.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: You have told me too many of him already, sir, if

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: they be true; if not true, none were enough.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: I was once before him for getting a wench with child.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Did you such a thing?

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Yes, marry, did I but I was fain to forswear it;

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: they would else have married me to the rotten medlar.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Sir, your company is fairer than honest. Rest you well.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: By my troth, I'll go with thee to the lane's end:

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: if bawdy talk offend you, we'll have very little of

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: it. Nay, friar, I am a kind of burr; I shall stick.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Exeunt

speaker: LUCIO

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: against us.

speaker: ANGELO

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: him.

speaker: ESCALUS

speaker: ANGELO

speaker: ANGELO

speaker: ANGELO

speaker: ANGELO

text_entry: And hold you ever to our special drift;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Let him not die. My brother had but justice,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: In that he did the thing for which he died:

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: For Angelo,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: His act did not o'ertake his bad intent,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: And must be buried but as an intent

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: That perish'd by the way: thoughts are no subjects;

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Intents but merely thoughts.

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: Merely, my lord.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Your suit's unprofitable; stand up, I say.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I have bethought me of another fault.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Provost, how came it Claudio was beheaded

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: At an unusual hour?

speaker: Provost
text_entry: It was commanded so.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Had you a special warrant for the deed?

speaker: Provost
text_entry: No, my good lord; it was by private message.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: For which I do discharge you of your office:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Give up your keys.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Pardon me, noble lord:

speaker: Provost
text_entry: I thought it was a fault, but knew it not;

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Yet did repent me, after more advice;

speaker: Provost
text_entry: For testimony whereof, one in the prison,

speaker: Provost
text_entry: That should by private order else have died,

speaker: Provost
text_entry: I have reserved alive.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: What's he?

speaker: Provost
text_entry: His name is Barnardine.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I would thou hadst done so by Claudio.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Go fetch him hither; let me look upon him.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Exit Provost

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: I am sorry, one so learned and so wise

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: As you, Lord Angelo, have still appear'd,

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Should slip so grossly, both in the heat of blood.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: And lack of temper'd judgment afterward.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: I am sorry that such sorrow I procure:

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: And so deep sticks it in my penitent heart

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: That I crave death more willingly than mercy;

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: 'Tis my deserving, and I do entreat it.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Re-enter Provost, with BARNARDINE, CLAUDIO muffled, and JULIET

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Which is that Barnardine?

speaker: Provost
text_entry: This, my lord.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: There was a friar told me of this man.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Sirrah, thou art said to have a stubborn soul.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That apprehends no further than this world,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And squarest thy life according. Thou'rt condemn'd:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: But, for those earthly faults, I quit them all;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And pray thee take this mercy to provide

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: For better times to come. Friar, advise him;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I leave him to your hand. What muffled fellow's that?

speaker: Provost
text_entry: This is another prisoner that I saved.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Who should have died when Claudio lost his head;

speaker: Provost
text_entry: As like almost to Claudio as himself.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Unmuffles CLAUDIO

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: [To ISABELLA]  If he be like your brother, for his sake

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Is he pardon'd; and, for your lovely sake,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Give me your hand and say you will be mine.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: He is my brother too: but fitter time for that.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: By this Lord Angelo perceives he's safe;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Methinks I see a quickening in his eye.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Well, Angelo, your evil quits you well:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Look that you love your wife; her worth worth yours.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I find an apt remission in myself;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And yet here's one in place I cannot pardon.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To LUCIO

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: You, sirrah, that knew me for a fool, a coward,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: One all of luxury, an ass, a madman;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Wherein have I so deserved of you,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That you extol me thus?

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: 'Faith, my lord. I spoke it but according to the

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: trick. If you will hang me for it, you may; but I

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: had rather it would please you I might be whipt.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Whipt first, sir, and hanged after.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Proclaim it, provost, round about the city.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Is any woman wrong'd by this lewd fellow,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: As I have heard him swear himself there's one

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Whom he begot with child, let her appear,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And he shall marry her: the nuptial finish'd,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Let him be whipt and hang'd.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: I beseech your highness, do not marry me to a whore.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Your highness said even now, I made you a duke:

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: good my lord, do not recompense me in making me a cuckold.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Upon mine honour, thou shalt marry her.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Thy slanders I forgive; and therewithal

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Remit thy other forfeits. Take him to prison;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And see our pleasure herein executed.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Marrying a punk, my lord, is pressing to death,

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: whipping, and hanging.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Slandering a prince deserves it.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Exit Officers with LUCIO

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: She, Claudio, that you wrong'd, look you restore.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Joy to you, Mariana! Love her, Angelo:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I have confess'd her and I know her virtue.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Thanks, good friend Escalus, for thy much goodness:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: There's more behind that is more gratulate.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Thanks, provost, for thy care and secrecy:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: We shill employ thee in a worthier place.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Forgive him, Angelo, that brought you home

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The head of Ragozine for Claudio's:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The offence pardons itself. Dear Isabel,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I have a motion much imports your good;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Whereto if you'll a willing ear incline,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: What's mine is yours and what is yours is mine.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: So, bring us to our palace; where we'll show

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: What's yet behind, that's meet you all should know.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Exeunt
